title: Scott Adams Systemic Racism Challenge, Systemic Agency and the Non-Player Character
description:
"Systemic Racism" has become a Shibboleth in today's culture war shouting match. (Got it wrong in the video. Book of Judges. https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Judges+12:6&version=NIV) 

As is often the case with my videos I don't get to the point but can articulate it later. I did so on Twitter today. You can find it here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2020/06/16/scott-adams-systemic-racism-systemic-agency/

Scott Adams announced a challenge on Twitter to explain what it is and offer an example. https://twitter.com/ScottAdamsSays/status/1271780204029939718 

Scott Alexander "Against Murderism" https://slatestarcodex.com/2017/06/21/against-murderism/

Distributist Vaush Cancel Culture Motte and Bailey https://youtu.be/ox-08tXXDS0
PVK and Vaush https://youtu.be/LAUgExXyez4
Scott Adams Challenge again https://youtu.be/nS4bdyJh_Js?t=691
Madness of the Crowds https://amzn.to/30KZyN9
Loury McWhorter https://youtu.be/2RMEiclpA7E
Black Academic from UC Berkeley Letter https://pastebin.com/D6mnC4Bf
White People dumb themselves down when the speak to blacks. https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2018/11/30/white-liberals-dumb-themselves-down-when-they-speak-black-people-new-study-contends/
It feels good to be a victim https://youtu.be/TJARKukC5Zo
Why Relate to a Personal God https://youtu.be/65CcfvXXHug
Humans appropriate truth metaphorically https://youtu.be/UpzDM5BnfIk
